mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(id, goodsName, manufacturer, expiryDt, price, contact, address, usableCapacity, title, explanation, status, writeDt, modifyDt) VALUE (#{id}, #{goodsName}, #{manufacturer}, #{expiryDt}, #{price}, #{contact}, #{address}, #{usableCapacity}, #{title}, #{explanation}, #{status}, #{writeDt}, #{modifyDt})
INSERT INTO file(gno, bno, name, path, size, extension, regDt, modifyDt, delDt) VALUE (#{gno}, #{bno}, #{name}, #{path}, #{size}, #{extension}, #{regDt}, #{modifyDt}, #{delDt})
